While combined effect great balance training alone , stochastic resonance require relatively expensive equipment commercially available . Thus , purpose investigation test hypothesis combine low cost STARS ( e.g . plantar massage joint mobilization ) balance training result great sensorimotor functional improvement CAI balance train alone .
DOC.brief_title: Balance Training vs. Balance Training w/ STARS
DOC.criteria: Males female age 18 35 . A history least one episode `` give way '' within past 3 month . Answering 4 question `` Yes '' Ankle Instability Instrument ( AII ) . Score < 90 % selfreported Foot Ankle Ability Measure ( FAAM ) . Score < 80 % FAAM Sport . Failing meet inclusion criterion . Known balance vision problem . Acute low extremity head injury occur < 6 week ago . Chronic musculoskeletal condition know affect balance . A history ankle surgery fix internal derangement .
